attributes.action: Raise British prestige by putting forward the need for a new Royal Yacht
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to raise British prestige in the world and the country's morale.  With the USA announcing the replacement of the ageing presidential Air Force One aircraft, its time for Great Britain to commission a new Royal Yacht to fly the flag, promote British industry and goals, and put a positive pride back in the Nation.
